name: Idle Plant
description:
Arrow keys -> WASD

A button -> J 

B button -> K

Welcome to Idle Plant!

Your goal is to build power plants to power your local town.

Every person in the town will use electricity and pay his or her bills to you.

Navigate the menu with the arrow keys. Use A to confirm and B go back or exit menus.

Upgrade your power plants in the shop. 

Try to find out what the Mayor can do for you.

The goal is to reach 25 Million population as fast as you can.

Feel free to put the tab in the background and let it run for a while to get more $$$ :)
